CountryCreation: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Country (CountryId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Name TEXT NOT NULL, TimeAdded DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, IsDeleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
IndustryCreation: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Industry (IndustryId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Name TEXT, TimeAdded DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, IsDeleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
OrganizationCreation: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Organization (OrganizationId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, [Index] TEXT, Name TEXT, Website TEXT, CountryId INTEGER, Description TEXT, Founded INTEGER, IndustryId INTEGER, NumberOfEmployees INTEGER, TimeAdded DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, IsDeleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
AccountCreation: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Account (AccountId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Username TEXT NOT NULL, Salt BLOB NOT NULL, HashedPassword BLOB NOT NULL,IsAdmin INTEGER DEFAULT 0, TimeAdded DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, IsDeleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
FilePathCreation: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FilePath (Path TEXT PRIMARY KEY, TimeWhenRead DATETIME, TimeAdded DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, IsDeleted INTEGER DEFAULT 0);
